lines.text: First Wong Fa and then Ling Xuong.
Once an evil deed is done, then it never ends... it goes on and it goes on forever.
You've 10 days to solve this and then you will be whipped. And for every extra day, there's one extra stoke.

[looking intently at Ma Chow]
I didn't expect Three.
And that damn judge ought to pay as well!

All judges are the same. If we kill him, the next one may be worse, and we can't kill them all. We better carry on the teacher's orders, find the money, use it well, and try to atone for the clan's crimes.
